name: Custom Sitemap Generator
author: WPGeared

sections.description:
Custom Sitemap Generator is a powerful WordPress plugin that allows you to create and manage XML sitemaps for your website. It provides both automatic sitemap generation for your posts and pages, as well as the ability to create custom sitemaps with specific URLs.

Key features:
* Automatic generation of post and page sitemaps
* Custom sitemap creation with user-defined URLs
* Exclusion of specific posts, pages, or URLs from sitemaps
* Modern, user-friendly interface
* Efficient sitemap management
For more information and support, please visit our website.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the custom-sitemap-generator folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings > Custom Sitemap to configure and use the plugin
sections.faq:
Where are the generated sitemaps stored?

As of version 2.0.0, sitemaps are now stored in the root directory of your WordPress installation for better accessibility and SEO performance.

Can I exclude specific posts or pages from the sitemap?

Yes, you can exclude specific posts, pages, or custom URLs from your sitemaps using the exclusion settings in the plugin’s admin interface.

How often should I update my sitemap?

It’s recommended to update your sitemap whenever you add, remove, or significantly modify content on your website. This plugin allows you to easily regenerate sitemaps as needed.
sections.changelog:
2.0.0

  • Major update with significant improvements and new features
  • Added Regular sitemaps: posts and pages
  • Added feature to exclude specific posts, pages, or URLs from sitemaps
  • Improved security with enhanced nonce checks and input sanitization
  • Updated sitemap file storage location to WordPress root directory for better accessibility
  • Refined custom sitemap naming convention (sitemap1.xml, sitemap2.xml, etc.)
  • Enhanced delete functionality for custom sitemaps
  • Improved user interface for sitemap management
  • Added confirmation dialog before sitemap deletion
  • Fixed issues with sitemap editing and updating
  • Ensured compatibility with WordPress version 6.6.2

1.2

  • Added support for custom post types in sitemap generation
  • Improved performance for large sites

1.1

  • Bug fixes and performance improvements

1.0

  • Initial release
